previewArticle.title: Bosnia-Herzegovina vs. Ivory Coast: Road to Brazil  | International Friendly Preview

recapArticle.title: Bosnia-Herzegovina 2, Ivory Coast 1 | Road to Brazil Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Adel Brkić
timelineItems.text: Im hoping Visca isnt a legit forward and plays more in the hole otherwise we are royally screwed #BiH

timelineItems.name: Adel Brkić
timelineItems.text: Impressed with the hunger and intensity in the first 10 mins. However careless passing. Clean it up. #BiH

timelineItems.text: Really wishing I'd got tickets for this Bosnia-Ivory Coast game #RoadToBrazil

timelineItems.text: #CIV defence tho' smh.. Loads of attacking intensity from #BIH.

timelineItems.name: Ilma Gušo

timelineItems.name: Kristie Anne Wasko
timelineItems.text: So excited!!!!!!
